Railway links with adjacent countries.
To its north, Mexico shares a <a href="Mexico%E2%80%93United%20States%20border">border with the United States</a> that is in length The two countries share the same <a href="track%20gauge">track gauge</a> of , with multiple links. <a href="CG%20Railway">CG Railway</a> operates a <a href="Train%20ferry%23Mexico">train ferry</a> between the <a href="port%20of%20Mobile">port of Mobile</a> at <a href="Mobile%2C%20Alabama">Mobile, Alabama</a> and the port of <a href="Coatzacoalcos">Coatzacoalcos</a>, <a href="Veracruz">Veracruz</a>.
To its south, Mexico shares an border with Guatemala and a border with Belize. There is rebuilt link with <a href="rail%20transport%20in%20Guatemala">rail transport in Guatemala</a> at <a href="Ciudad%20Tec%C3%BAn%20Um%C3%A1n">Ciudad Tecún Umán</a> in <a href="Ayutla%2C%20San%20Marcos">Ayutla, San Marcos</a>, with a <a href="Break-of-gauge">break of gauge</a>. / (rebuilt as standard gauge in 2019)
